data.title: Travel Distance between Kalka and Delhi
data.meta_description: Kalka, India to Delhi, India distance • How many miles / kilometer from Delhi to Kalka? Travel direction, route map & air travel distance between Delhi and Kalka.
data.text:
Distance Between Kalka and Delhi

Given below is the distance between Delhi, India and Kalka, India. A map showing location of Delhi and Kalka with air travel direction is also provided. Along with Kalka - Delhi distance, you can also find current time & time difference between Delhi and Kalka, lattitude & longitude of both cities and flight duration.

Delhi and Kalka are in the same timezone Asia/Kolkata.

Delhi to Kalka Distance • Map & Travel Direction

Travel direction from Delhi to Kalka is and direction from Kalka to Delhi is

The map below shows the location of Delhi and Kalka. The blue line represents the straight line joining these two place. The distance shown is the straight line or the air travel distance between Kalka and Delhi.

What is the travel distance between Delhi, India and Kalka, India? How many miles is it from Kalka to Delhi. 151 miles / 243.01 km is the flight distance between these two places.
